alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:19PM CDT until May 08 at 2:20AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Verdigris River at Coffeyville affecting Montgomery County. Verdigris River at Independence affecting Wilson and Montgomery Counties. For the Verdigris River...including Altoona, Independence, Coffeyville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Verdigris River at Independence. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 32.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue falling to 22.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Verdigris River Independence 30.0 32.4 Fri 8 pm CDT 27.9 21.0 19.8 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Flooding is occurring or is imminent. Most flood related deaths occur in automobiles. Do not attempt to cross water covered bridges, dips, or low water crossings. Never try to cross a flowing stream, even a small one, on foot. To escape rising water find another route over higher ground. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
